00003 def sesFunction(count):
00004     if count == 1: return ""
00005     else: return "s"
00006 
00007 for i in range(1, 10, 2):
00008     print "%s little indian%s" % (i, sesFunction(i))
00009 
00010 sesLambda = lambda count: (count == 1 and [""] or ["s"])[0]
00011 
00012 for i in range(1, 10, 2):
00013     print "%s little indian%s" % (i, sesLambda(i))
